author: barnabasbusa
content:
Teku-geth-5 sending inconsistent datacolumsidecars with an invalid index, according to nimbus:
```
WRN 2024-10-15 07:36:31.165+00:00 Received data columns is inconsistent      topics="syncman" data_columns_map=||||||||| request=78003:4@4140 peer=16U*Pha3Q2 direction=forward msg="DataColumnSidecar: invalid index" peer_speed=265492.0 index=12 peer_score=1000 sync_ident=main
```

content:
Daylight saving changes has affected and will some timezones in Oct/Nov
- For Australia, meeting time changed from 8pm to 9pm ðŸ˜ª 
- For East US (EDT) it would become 5am instead of 6am ðŸ˜´ 
- For most of europe it's probably fine as it's around mid day
- Asia mostly not affected by DST

Does this time still work for most people that have been joining the call? I think it EDT are most impacted, 5am seems way too early. I don't know if we have anyone at EDT, but shifting an hour later would be quite difficult for my timezone.
